A precision-engineered assault rifle known for its reliability, accuracy, and robust construction, making it a favorite among military forces. Featuring a long barrel, folding stock, and a full-length rail system, it provides excellent performance in both medium and long-range engagements. Its durability and smooth operation in harsh environments make it a trusted choice for professional operators.

A precision marksman variant of the SG 550, designed for long-range accuracy and enhanced ballistic performance. Featuring a heavier barrel, improved optics compatibility, and a reinforced stock, it provides superior stability for designated marksmen. Though it is somewhat lacking in stopping power and accuracy when compared to a dedicated sniper rifle, it retains the reliability and build quality of the SG 550.

A compact variant of the SG 550, designed for special forces and close-quarters combat, offering increased maneuverability without sacrificing firepower. Its shorter barrel and lightweight frame enhance handling in tight spaces, while its modular design allows for easy attachment of optics and tactical accessories. Despite its reduced size, it maintains the accuracy and reliability of its full-sized counterpart, making it a highly versatile weapon.
